item.description:
UPDATE: This dinner will be at O'Connors in Worcester.  Come a little early, 6:40ish.  Parking can be a bear...  See you all Friday!

 

________________________________________________________________

Hey all, If you didn't notice (http://www.ebiblefellowship.com/outreach/tracts/may21/), the world ends again on the 21st of this month. "On October 21st, 2011, God will completely destroy this creation and all of the people who never experienced the salvation of Jesus Christ along with it." Sadly, I'll be evaporating in a mist of hellfire and damnation on the 21st and can't do dinner that night. So let's get together for dinner afterwards! I'll pick a place in the next few weeks, but it will be a Worcester area restaurant. RSVP ASAP so I can get some idea of a number.
item.name: Post Apocalypse Dinner
